articles.description: We’re celebrating Polygon’s 10th anniversary by looking at the future of the things we cover, with new stories and guest contributions (from Jordan Mechner, S.S. Rajamouli, Alec Robbins, and others) all week
articles.content:
The Next 10 main illustration: Myriam Wares
In celebration of Polygons 10 year anniversary, weve decided to do it up right with a special issue were calling The Next 10. But rather than look back, w… [+481 chars]
